attributes.action: Give Gareth Southgate a knighthood if England win the euros
attributes.additional_details: England have had nearly 50 years of being a laughing stock in football and never having any joy despite being one of the biggest footballing countries in the world. Gareth Southgate is bringing it home and changing all of that. The man is a genius and already a national treasure, he deserves to be officially the most respected man in the country, a knighthood would be the least of things he deserves.
attributes.background: Give a knighthood and any other possible accolade to Gareth Southgate if England win the euros, make him the most respected man in the country

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
